title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama GitHub repo with the CLI, Go library, and Docker image for running Llama-2, Code Llama, and other models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI (terminal UI) wrapper around the Ollama CLI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, published on PyPI as ‘ollama-haystack’, for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and CLI for Ollama, distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI/CD pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama completions into Slack channels.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat template that proxies to Ollama with streaming support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for generating text with local Ollama models inside notes.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment example for scaling Ollama models across GPUs.
